metadata.title: CVE-2023-35969 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 chain_table parsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115.A specially crafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. Avictim would need to open a malicious file to trigger thesevulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns the chain_table of`FST_BL_VCDATA` and `FST_BL_VCDATA_DYN_ALIAS` section types.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
